issues.shortMessage: Refactor this code to not nest more than 3 control flow statements
issues.fullMessage: Nested "if", "switch", "for", "foreach", "while", "do", and "try" statements are key ingredients for making what's known as "Spaghetti code". Such code is hard to read, refactor and therefore maintain.

properties.title: Control flow statements "if", "for", "foreach", "do", "while", "switch" and "try" should not be nested too deeply
